channel.title: Changing textures in walls through client
channel.description:
Ok guys, well i know basically what you are supposed to do, but i dont know which code to change in class_30_sub2_sub_sub3, i get an error when i compile. Could you tell me which code to activate near the list of textures:
[code] */
/* Textures * 50 suggests the end of the textures... * 49 = Something to do with 48, I assume * 48 = Hyroglyphs? * 47 = Extremely light wall colour... * 46 = Ground in varrock by the fountain * 45 = Door * 44 = Similar to 43; Darker * 43 = Buildings' stone wall * 42 = Sold blue, for those flowers in Varrock I believe * 41 = Bushes of some sort * 40 = lava * 39 = Painting of an elf * 38 = One of the new Falador textures * 37 = Same as 38 * 36 = Door or floor texture? * 35 = New Falador walls * 34 = Magic tree stars * 33 = Maple tree leaves * 32 = Sand maybe? * 31 = Another lava overlay * 30 = Yew tree overlays * 29 = Sort of like fern leaves :\ * 28 = ??????????????????????? * 27 = Snake skin * 26 = Spider webs * 25 = Water of some sort, I think * 24 = Flowing water * 23 = Dark buidling siding (something near Lumbridge I think?) * 22 = Wooden floor * 21 = Roofing maybe? * 20 = Book case * 19 = Something with.. holes.. * 18 = Sand..or..something? * 17 = Water found water * 16 = Wooden roof I think. * 15 = Looks like an overlay for water? * 14 = Portrait of a king * 13 = Landscape of mountains * 12 = Bars on those jail doors, etc * 11 = Runecrafting altar \ mysterious rune texture * 10 = Solid blue... * 9 = Tree stumps * 8 = Tree leaves * 7 = Um.. Logs or something? * 6 = Red roofing * 5 = Really dark wood texture * 4 = Elven doors * 3 = Wooden flooring * 2 = Stone walls (i.e. on Varrock banks, etc) * 1 = Water * 0 = Door **/
[/code]
Could some1 help me on this? Thanks

item.title: Changing textures in walls through client
item.dc:creator: @Full_metal_jacket Full metal jacket
item.description:
@Full_metal_jacket wrote:

Try doing in in the makeGlobalObject’s section of your client.java file

Read full topic
item.source: Changing textures in walls through client

item.title: Changing textures in walls through client
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

Easy, tell me what folder. Yes you posted it but there is none called class_30_sub2_sub_sub3. Look closely.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing textures in walls through client
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

Ok guys, well i know basically what you are supposed to do, but i dont know which code to change in class_30_sub2_sub_sub3, i get an error when i compile. Could you tell me which code to activate near the list of textures:

	 */
	 
	 
	 	/*	Textures
	 *	50	suggests the end of the textures...
	 *	49	=	Something to do with 48, I assume
	 *	48	=	Hyroglyphs?
	 *	47	=	Extremely light wall colour...
	 *	46	=	Ground in varrock by the fountain
	 *	45	=	Door
	 *	44	=	Similar to 43; Darker
	 *	43	=	Buildings' stone wall
	 *	42	=	Sold blue, for those flowers in Varrock I believe
	 *	41	=	Bushes of some sort
	 *	40	=	lava	
	 *	39	=	Painting of an elf
	 *	38	=	One of the new Falador textures
	 *	37	=	Same as 38	
	 *	36	=	Door or floor texture?
	 *	35	=	New Falador walls
	 *	34	=	Magic tree stars	
	 *	33	=	Maple tree leaves
	 *	32	=	Sand maybe?
	 *	31	=	Another lava overlay
	 *	30	=	Yew tree overlays
	 *	29	=	Sort of like fern leaves :\
	 *	28	=	???????????????????????
	 *	27	=	Snake skin
	 *	26	=	Spider webs
	 *	25	=	Water of some sort, I think	
	 *	24	=	Flowing water	
	 *	23	=	Dark buidling siding (something near Lumbridge I think?)
	 *	22	=	Wooden floor
	 *	21	=	Roofing maybe?
	 *	20	=	Book case
	 *	19	=	Something with.. holes..
	 *	18	=	Sand..or..something?
	 *	17	=	Water found water
	 *	16	=	Wooden roof I think.
	 *	15	=	Looks like an overlay for water?
	 *	14	=	Portrait of a king
	 *	13	=	Landscape of mountains	
	 *	12	=	Bars on those jail doors, etc
	 *	11	=	Runecrafting altar \ mysterious rune texture
	 *	10	=	Solid blue...
	 *	9	=	Tree stumps
	 *	8	=	Tree leaves
	 *	7	=	Um.. Logs or something?
	 *	6	=	Red roofing
	 *	5	=	Really dark wood texture
	 *	4	=	Elven doors
	 *	3	=	Wooden flooring
	 *	2	=	Stone walls (i.e. on Varrock banks, etc)
	 *	1	=	Water
	 *	0	=	Door
	 **/

Could some1 help me on this? Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Changing textures in walls through client
